description: Returns an Evaluation that includes metadata as well as the current status of the Evaluation.

parameters.name: EvaluationId
parameters.description: The ID of the Evaluation to retrieve. The evaluation of each MLModel is recorded and cataloged. The ID provides the means to access the information.

nested_items.name: EvaluationId
nested_items.description: The evaluation ID which is same as the EvaluationId in the request.

nested_items.name: MLModelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the MLModel that was the focus of the evaluation.

nested_items.name: EvaluationDataSourceId
nested_items.description: The DataSource used for this evaluation.

nested_items.name: InputDataLocationS3
nested_items.description: The location of the data file or directory in Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3).

nested_items.name: CreatedByIamUser
nested_items.description: The AWS user account that invoked the evaluation. The account type can be either an AWS root account or an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) user account.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time that the Evaluation was created. The time is expressed in epoch time.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time of the most recent edit to the Evaluation. The time is expressed in epoch time.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A user-supplied name or description of the Evaluation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the evaluation. This element can have one of the following values:
PENDING - Amazon Machine Language (Amazon ML) submitted a request to evaluate an MLModel.
INPROGRESS - The evaluation is underway.
FAILED - The request to evaluate an MLModel did not run to completion. It is not usable.
COMPLETED - The evaluation process completed successfully.
DELETED - The Evaluation is marked as deleted. It is not usable.

nested_items.name: PerformanceMetrics
nested_items.description: Measurements of how well the MLModel performed using observations referenced by the DataSource. One of the following metric is returned based on the type of the MLModel:
BinaryAUC: A binary MLModel uses the Area Under the Curve (AUC) technique to measure performance.
RegressionRMSE: A regression MLModel uses the Root Mean Square Error (RMSE) technique to measure performance. RMSE measures the difference between predicted and actual values for a single variable.
MulticlassAvgFScore: A multiclass MLModel uses the F1 score technique to measure performance.

nested_items.name: LogUri
nested_items.description: A link to the file that contains logs of the CreateEvaluation operation.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A description of the most recent details about evaluating the MLModel.

nested_items.name: ComputeTime
nested_items.description: The approximate CPU time in milliseconds that Amazon Machine Learning spent processing the Evaluation, normalized and scaled on computation resources. ComputeTime is only available if the Evaluation is in the COMPLETED state.

nested_items.name: FinishedAt
nested_items.description: The epoch time when Amazon Machine Learning marked the Evaluation as COMPLETED or FAILED. FinishedAt is only available when the Evaluation is in the COMPLETED or FAILED state.

nested_items.name: StartedAt
nested_items.description: The epoch time when Amazon Machine Learning marked the Evaluation as INPROGRESS. StartedAt isn't available if the Evaluation is in the PENDING state.
